00001 /* ======================================================================================
00002 SWARMACTIVITYMODEL - contains group activity recognition parameters and stores SWARMHISTORY
00003 
00004 SWARMHISTORY - is a record of all swarming events (e.g. instantaneously forming groups) 
00005 in the tracked video. 
00006 
00007 SWARMEVENT - Is described by: 
00008         - type of event (GROUPING, LEADER FOLLOWING, LINING UP, CO-DWELLING, etc)
00009     - list of unique event participant IDs (bodies)
00010         - frame it occurred at
00011         - event likelihood
00012 
00013 SWARMACTIVITY - Lasts for more than one frame and 
00014 can be deduced from multiple SwarmEvent objects
00015 ======================================================================================== */
00016
